subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Bruce C. Ratner, the principal owner of the Nets, said he “wouldn’t be a happy camper” if the team were to lose Jason Kidd or Vince Carter, its star players.
snippet: Bruce C. Ratner, the principal owner of the Nets, said he “wouldn’t be a happy camper” if the team were to lose Jason Kidd or Vince Carter, its star players.
